coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A marking discreetly engraved into the mask's underside informs you that it was made by 'C4MG1RL'.
coreAttributes.name: Trickster's mask
coreAttributes.description: A fox-like mask, the design of which is based on the mysterious and mischievous youko. Perfect for concealing one's identity while getting up to all kinds of schemes.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] on the mask and secure the straps behind [npc.her] head.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the mask onto [npc2.namePos] face, then secure the straps behind [npc2.her] head.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] the mask onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.face], then secure the straps behind [npc.her] head.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the straps behind [npc.her] head, then [npc.verb(take)] off [npc.her] mask.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the straps behind [npc2.her] head, then [npc.verb(take)] off [npc2.namePos] mask.
